attributes.action: re-instate sound money into the British Financial System
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We understand that inflation is the increase of the money supply under a flawed currency system, which in turn causes the higher prices we are experiencing today.

We therefore call on the Prime Minister to :

-instruct the Bank of England to cease printing money out of thin air

and

-re-instate the gold standard


Should the Prime Minister ignore this call, then he has demonstrated his faith in paper money printed out of thin air by a central bank.
